analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MestCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#864-891):
	External calls:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#885)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#885-887)

FounderAllocation.unlock (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#794-800) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensCreated == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol:
	Contract FounderAllocation has payable functions:
	 - unlock (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#794-800)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in MestCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#994-1017):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(address(founderAllocation),_founder) (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#1003-1005)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _founder (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#1008-1009)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#397-413) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#409)

FounderAllocation.unlock (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#794-800) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mest.transfer(founderStorageVault,tokensCreated) (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#799-800)

MestCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#864-891) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#887)

MestCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#994-1017) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(address(founderAllocation),_founder) (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#1003-1005)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#1016)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x7b47e1473f97040689812204113ff549b2e2c31b.sol#124) is not in mixedCase
